infotexts.talentdescription.medicalexpertise.mod: Boosts your ‖color:gui.orange‖Medical‖end‖ skill by [amount]. You cover wounds more effectively.
infotexts.talentdescription.chemicalsboughtcheaper: ‖color:gui.orange‖Chemicals‖end‖ can be bought [amount0]% cheaper. You can buy ‖color:gui.orange‖experimental medicines‖end‖ [amount1]% cheaper.
infotexts.talentdescription.dontdieonme.mod: The CPR you apply is much more powerful. You apply adrenalines more effectively.
infotexts.talentdescription.emergencyresponse.mod: You move [movementspeed]% faster, gain [painres]% pain resistance if any crewmember is unconscious.
infotexts.talentdescription.medicaleffectiveness.m: Medical items are [amount]% more potent when applied to you. You cause no ‖color:gui.red‖[affname]‖end‖ when self-applying syringes.
